about_the_game:
The official Planet Centauri soundtrack is here!

  • 60 tracks: A vast collection of music to enhance your gaming experience.

  • Exclusive tracks: Discover exclusive tunes not available in the game itself.

  • High-quality audio: Enjoy lossless audio in FLAC formats. (Also available in MP3)

  • Over 2h20 of music: Immerse yourself in hours of captivating melodies.

Experience the magic of Planet Centauri with this incredible soundtrack!
detailed_description:
The official Planet Centauri soundtrack is here!

  • 60 tracks: A vast collection of music to enhance your gaming experience.

  • Exclusive tracks: Discover exclusive tunes not available in the game itself.

  • High-quality audio: Enjoy lossless audio in FLAC formats. (Also available in MP3)

  • Over 2h20 of music: Immerse yourself in hours of captivating melodies.

Experience the magic of Planet Centauri with this incredible soundtrack!
name: Planet Centauri Soundtrack
short_description: Immerse yourself in over two hours of captivating music, featuring 60 tracks, including exclusive tunes not yet found in the game. Enjoy all your favorite melodies in high-quality MP3 and FLAC formats.
